BRIAN H DO

Ux-Focused Front-End Engineer

Designing and building meaningful web apps. I'm passionate about front-end development and intelligent ux. Currently seeking a full-time role.

Philosophy.

Designs influence cultures, including the way we live with and talk to one another. That's powerful, and to command this, good design should be purposeful: Strong when needed, hidden when not, yet always backed with intention.

As something functional, I see ux design as intertwined with development, in the way that architecture is intertwined with the engineering and construction that follows. This was my own entry into web development: To see it as a tool of digital design, necessary yet not less interesting.

Mainly, I'm passionate about the future of the web, especially as it'll evolve on the Jamstack.
